snippet.title: Covid19 - Toilet Paper Run [Alpha Gameplay Sneak Peek]
snippet.description:
Set in the early stage of COVID-19 pandemic, this third person "shooter" has you disinfect your way through coronavirus infested city square using hand sanitizer filled spray bottles. Now is your chance to get back at the virus that affected us all (and help Jeff get some toilet paper in the process)!

Short gameplay clip of a small indie game I'm working on in my spare time, uploaded to be submitted for @AskGamedev's Elevator Pitch video.

I wasn't quite ready to announce the game just yet, so this is all I'll say for now. This channel is the first place where you'll be able to learn more when it's ready, and after watching the clip and reading the pitch you are required by law to subsscribe anyways ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
